parts.text:
Rewrite the following article in Telugu language.
Your output MUST be a valid JSON object (do not use markdown blocks) with these keys:
{
  "telugu_title": "Title in Telugu",
  "telugu_body": "Body in Telugu (max 300 words)",
  "keywords": ["keyword1", "keyword2"]
}
Original Article:
Apple released a new iPhone today with better camera features.
